description: The VideoSecu low-profile mount features a slim 1" profile from the wall which is perfect for ultra thin LED TV. This mount is compatible with flat panel displays measuring between 27 to 55 inches with VESA mounting standard 100x100 to 400x400 (16" W x16" H). This mount supports up to 110 lbs. The steel construction offers strength and durability. The wide wall plate will support two stud installation for studs up to 16-Inch apart (most US homes have studs which are 16-Inch apart). Convenient quick-release tabs on both mounting brackets, and easily pull down to unlock the TV from the wall plate. VideoSecu brand wall mount, please report to Amazon if you received a mount without VideoSecu logo.
title: VideoSecu Low Profile Ultra Slim 1" profile TV Wall Mount for most 27"-47" LCD LED Plasma TV, Some up to 55" Flat Panel Screen Display with VESA 100x100 to 400x400 1RX
